de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies

Class FormatterAdvice

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.FormatterAdvice

  • public class FormatterAdvice
extends Object
    Pojo to keep formatter specific values together.
    Author:
    markiewb, bahlef

    • Constructor Detail

      • FormatterAdvice

        public FormatterAdvice(StyledDocument styledDocument,
                       int selectionStart,
                       int selectionEnd,
                       int caret,
                       JTextComponent editor)
        Creates a new FormatterAdvice.
        Parameters:
        styledDocument - the StyledDocument which should be formatted
        selectionStart - offset where the selection starts, or -1 if there is no selection
        selectionEnd - offset where the selection ends, or -1 if there is no selection
        caret - the caret position when the formatting was invoked
        editor - the JTextComponent holding the given StyledDocument

      • FormatterAdvice

        public FormatterAdvice(StyledDocument styledDocument,
                       SortedSet<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<Integer,Integer>> changedElements,
                       int caret,
                       JTextComponent editor)
        Creates a new FormatterAdvice.
        Parameters:
        styledDocument - the StyledDocument which should be formatted
        changedElements - a SortedSet of Pair objects as ranges which should be formatted, leaving everything outside of the ranges unformatted
        caret - the caret position when the formatting was invoked
        editor - the JTextComponent holding the given StyledDocument
